name: NOSTALGIC: Escape from photo
description:
NOSTALGIC: ESCAPE FROM PHOTO

A submission for 

GameMaker 20 Jam

AIM: Find one of twenty keys and then find the corresponding door. Door handles display the key you need. 

There are also three stars on the level. Can you find them all?

CONTROLS: 

  • Movement [W,A,S,D]
  • Use/Pick up [SPACEBAR]
  • Hold [Esc + R] to restart

For details on any assets used (all free), PM me.
